divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting on my back porch, it faces west without obstruction to low level sight. I was watching the approaching sunset that was about 45 min. away. I always notice the flight traffic in my area as BHam Intl. airport is south of me. I noticed what I at first thought was a jetliner, but once I tuned in on it I saw it was not a jet. It seemed to be more like a arrowhead that was gold in color perhaps because of the sunset. It had what appeared to be exhaust of perhaps a flame, it wasnt the normal trails you would see from a jetliner of any kind. My interest was on high and I went into my kitchen that is right with my porch to get my binoculars, I was only gone seconds but the object was gone. I searched the sky for several minutes but never saw it again. The exhaust seemed solid and close to the rear of the UFO, this is what really caught my interest.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Blaine
There were no other sightings in Blaine on or around August 5th 2013
Summary: {kt}saw UFO as bright outlined object with a short brighter exhaust. Observed only for a moment, went to get binoculars and it was gone. Gone for less than 20 seconds. I live by Bellingham Intl. airport and Iknow this was no jet or plane.
